attributes.action: Reverse the planned school funding cuts imposed by the new Gov funding formula
attributes.background: The government’s new national funding formula for schools means 98% schools will have their per-pupil funding cut, with an average loss per primary pupil of £339, and £477 per secondary pupil. School budgets will suffer unmanageable cuts leading to significant redundancies and larger class sizes.
